data: “Make haste, child,” called Aunt Jane; “there’s mighty little time between dinner and sundown, and if we’re goin' to town we’d better be startin'.”
"Make haste, child," called Aunt Jane; "there's mighty little time between dinner and sundown, and if we're goin' to town we'd better be startin'."
Hall, Eliza Calvert, 1856-1935; Nelson, G. Patrick [Illustrator]; Strong, Beulah [Illustrator]
